keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Pirates Arrive at Impel Down
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard and his crew breach the main entrance of Impel Down using Devil Fruit powers.
keyEvents.significance: Another major threat arrives at the prison, compounding the chaos from Luffy's escape attempt.

keyEvents.title: Unprecedented Chaos Across Multiple Levels
keyEvents.description: Impel Down faces simultaneous crises on Level 2 (riot), Level 4 (Luffy's escape), and the main entrance (Blackbeard's invasion).
keyEvents.significance: Shows the complete breakdown of security at the world's most secure prison.

description: The world's most secure underwater prison, containing the most dangerous criminals. Features multiple levels with increasing severity of punishment.
geography: Located in the Calm Belt between Paradise and the New World

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル2

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Mr. 3 Incite Riot
keyEvents.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 liberate prisoners on Level 2, creating a massive riot as cover for their escape.
keyEvents.significance: Forces Impel Down to divide its defensive resources across multiple levels.

keyEvents.title: Magellan Suppresses Level 2 Riot
keyEvents.description: Chief Warden Magellan uses his poison powers to efficiently suppress the prisoner riot.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's overwhelming power but leaves him dealing with other simultaneous threats.

description: The second level of Impel Down, known as Wild Beast Hell, where prisoners face dangerous beasts.
geography: Second level down from the entrance of Impel Down

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル4

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Continues Fighting
keyEvents.description: Luffy and his allies battle guards and obstacles while attempting to escape through Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: The ongoing escape attempt that adds to the overall chaos at Impel Down.

description: The fourth level of Impel Down, known as Blazing Hell, featuring a massive pool of boiling blood and extreme heat.
geography: Fourth level down from the entrance of Impel Down

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル6

keyEvents.title: Shiryu Released from His Cell
keyEvents.description: Shiryu is released from his cell on Level 6 and receives his sword.
keyEvents.significance: The release of one of the most dangerous prisoners sets up his eventual betrayal.

keyEvents.title: Shiryu Kills the Guards
keyEvents.description: Shiryu immediately murders all the guards who released him.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates why Shiryu was imprisoned and foreshadows his betrayal of Impel Down.

description: The lowest and most secure level of Impel Down, containing the most dangerous criminals whose existence has been erased from history.
geography: The deepest level of Impel Down, far below sea level

keyEvents.title: Sengoku Learns of Blackbeard's Disappearance
keyEvents.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku is informed that Blackbeard has mysteriously disappeared from his expected position.
keyEvents.significance: The Marines learn of Blackbeard's betrayal, adding to their concerns before the war.

description: The headquarters of the Marines, where Ace's execution is scheduled to take place.
geography: Located in Paradise, the first half of the Grand Line
